desc.f: The URI of the vault for performing operations on keys and secrets. This property is readonly
desc.to: The URI of the vault for performing operations on keys and secrets.

v.desc: Property to specify whether the vault will accept traffic from public internet. If set to 'disabled' all traffic except private endpoint traffic and that that originates from trusted services will be blocked. This will override the set firewall rules, meaning that even if the firewall rules are present we will not honor the rules.

sch.ov: The URI of the vault for performing operations on keys and secrets. This property is readonly
sch.v: The URI of the vault for performing operations on keys and secrets.

v.desc: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the key vault resource.

createdAt.desc: The timestamp of the key vault resource creation (UTC).

createdBy.desc: The identity that created the key vault resource.

lastModifiedAt.desc: The timestamp of the key vault resource last modification (UTC).

lastModifiedBy.desc: The identity that last modified the key vault resource.
